mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order (student_id, destination, usage_time, start_time, end_time, requested_car_type, bus_id, price, status, reject_reason, is_paid) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{destination}, #{usageTime}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{requestedCarType}, #{busId}, #{price}, #{status}, #{rejectReason}, #{isPaid})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_order SET student_id = #{studentId}, destination = #{destination}, usage_time = #{usageTime}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, requested_car_type = #{requestedCarType}, bus_id = #{busId}, price = #{price}, status = #{status}, reject_reason = #{rejectReason}, is_paid = #{isPaid} WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, b.bus_id as b_bus_id, b.plate_number, b.car_type, b.driver_name, b.is_active FROM t_order o LEFT JOIN t_bus b ON o.bus_id = b.bus_id WHERE o.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY o.start_time DESC, o.order_id DESC
